commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<?php
// Check stok table column structure
$mysqli = new mysqli('localhost', 'ilekasoft_crmdb', 'ilekaDB*123', 'ilekasoft_crmdb');
$mysqli->set_charset('utf8mb4');

if ($mysqli->connect_error) {
    die('Connection failed: ' . $mysqli->connect_error);
}

echo "Stok table columns:\n";
$result = $mysqli->query('DESCRIBE stok');
while ($row = $result->fetch_assoc()) {
    echo $row['Field'] . ' - ' . $row['Type'] . "\n";
}

echo "\n\nSample stok data (first 3 rows):\n";
$result = $mysqli->query('SELECT * FROM stok LIMIT 3');
if ($result && $result->num_rows > 0) {
    $fields = $result->fetch_fields();
    foreach ($fields as $field) {
        echo $field->name . "\t";
    }
    echo "\n";
    
    while ($row = $result->fetch_assoc()) {
        foreach ($row as $value) {
            echo substr($value, 0, 20) . "\t";
        }
        echo "\n";
    }
} else {
    echo "No data found in stok table\n";
}

$mysqli->close();
?>
